    • Constructor Detail

      • RoundedBorder

        public RoundedBorder(java.awt.Color color,
                     int thickness,
                     int radii)
        Parameters:
        color - defines the color of the border.
        thickness - defines the thickness the border.
        radii - defines the curveness of the 4 corners of the border.

      • RoundedBorder

        public RoundedBorder(java.awt.Color color,
                     int thickness,
                     int radii,
                     int paddingTop,
                     int paddingLeft,
                     int paddingBottom,
                     int paddingRight)
        Parameters:
        color - defines the color of the border.
        thickness - defines the thickness the border.
        radii - defines the curveness of the 4 corners of the border.
        paddingTop - defines the top padding of the component from the border.
        paddingLeft - defines the left padding of the component from the border.
        paddingBottom - defines the bottom padding of the component from the border.
        paddingRight - defines the right padding of the component from the border.
